mapper.insert: insert into Member(mb_id, mb_pw, mb_nick, mb_type) values(#{mb_id},#{mb_pw},#{mb_nick},#{mb_type})
mapper.update: update Member set mb_pw=#{mb_pw}, mb_nick=#{mb_nick}, mb_age=#{mb_age}, mb_friend=#{mb_friend} where mb_num=#{mb_num}
update Member set mb_pic=#{mb_pic} where mb_num=#{mb_num}
mapper.select: select * from Member where mb_id=#{mb_id} and mb_pw=#{mb_pw}
select count(*) from members where mb_id = #{mb_id}
mapper.delete: delete from Member where mb_id=#{mb_id} and mb_pw=#{mb_pw}
